forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West wind 12 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West wind 12 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
A gentle breeze sweeps through Downtown San Francisco today, carrying hints of the ocean as the city embraces a mostly sunny disposition. With temperatures hovering around the mid-60s and a pleasant west wind ruffling hair and skirts alike, the day beckons one outdoors. As you stroll through the streets, you might witness the proud silhouette of the Golden Gate Bridge skimming the skyline, partially adorned by a soft layer of coastal fog that appears to retreat but never fully disappears. This is a classic San Francisco morning, where sunshine kisses the cool, crisp air, reminding you that layers are your best ally; a light jacket is a wise choice to navigate the fluctuating temperatures, especially as afternoon approaches and breezes whisper reminders of the chill that comes with evening.

As the day progresses, the charm of the city unfolds beautifully, inviting a sense of exploration. Consider ambling through Golden Gate Park or visiting a tucked-away café to enjoy a leisurely read. The air of the city, infused with the scent of fresh coffee and baked goods, makes for an ideal backdrop to simply pause and reflect. Tonight, as the sun draws its curtain behind the horizon, the skies will clear to partly cloudy, letting the evening air settle gently around you. So bring your comfortable shoes, a cozy sweater, and ready yourself for the most delightful of San Francisco afternoons and evenings, replete with the simple joys that our remarkable city has to offer.
